column5: Best way to work off a few xmas calories.
I am extremely jealous ,I think I emigrated to the wrong province

You certainly are blessed Simon! Fantastic Walleye action! I tried to see how you hook your minnows on the jig head......can you share? It looks like they are hooked through the tail? Thanks & Happy New Year!
Brian at 6:33 it looked like it was hooked under the dorsal fin and the ball head was hanging by the tail, my eyes aren't what they used to be though.
Haha to funny yes we are Simon I always think of Dryden as part of ManitobaÂ , I guess I am just another Brit lost in Canada .P.s always enjoy your posts .
